code: import{useQuery}from"react-query";import Http from"./http.api";var GetCountriesUrl="http://hamnavazi-api.azurewebsites.net/api/Instrument/Location/GetCountysByCountryId";var getCountiesById=function getCountiesById(id){return Http.get(GetCountriesUrl,{params:{Id:id}}).then(function(res){return res.data.result;}).catch(function(err){return;});};export var useAllCounties=function useAllCounties(id){return useQuery(["counties",id],getCountiesById,{retry:1,retryDelay:500,refetchOnWindowFocus:false});};
